title: Middle East Crisis: With $20 Billion Weapons Deal, U.S. Aims to Help Israel and Deter Iran
content: The White House, which has told Congress it is allowing a large package of future arms sales to Israel, has tried to contain opposition to the deal while working to avert a regional war.
summary: The White House, which has told Congress it is allowing a large package of future arms sales to Israel, has tried to contain opposition to the deal while working to avert a regional war.

title: Families of Dead Hostages Vent Anger at Israeli Leaders Over War

title: Modi Arrives in Kyiv as Ukraine Pushes Diplomacy

title: A History Museum Shows How China Wants to Remake Hong Kong

title: Sugar Industry Faces Pressure Over Coerced Hysterectomies in India
